title: MoonBit: Wasm-Optimized Language Creates Less Code Than Rust
author: Loraine Lawson
description: MoonBit is an end-to-end programming language that’s optimized for WebAssembly, while also compiling to JavaScript and Assembly code.
cntitle: MoonBit：Wasm 优化语言，代码量少于 Rust
cndescription: MoonBit 是一种端到端的编程语言，针对 WebAssembly 进行了优化，同时也可以编译成 JavaScript 和汇编代码。
